--- title: Makedf keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Contains public API to create pandas dataframe from json files. Uses ijson to read json files and pandas to create the dataframe." description: "Contains public API to create pandas dataframe from json files. Uses ijson to read json files and pandas to create the dataframe." ---

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class MakeDf[source]

MakeDf(key_str:str)

Provides API to create dataframe from json files. Provides the method dataframe() which can be used to create dataframes.

{% endraw %}

Example

{% raw %} 
%time
df = MakeDf('retweeted_status.full_text').dataframe("./test/working")
df.head()

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

MakeDf.dataframe[source]

MakeDf.dataframe(json_files_dir:str)

High level API to send data to producer.

Accepts the path to the directory where json files are stored.

Returns a dataframe

{% endraw %}
